refactor: Clean up test suite and improve WebSocket robustness

- Remove 69 legacy backend test files to streamline test suite
- Enhance WebSocket reconnection in useWebSocketReconnect hook
- Update MultiDesktopStreams with improved connection handling
- Refine desktop client dual screen capture implementation
- Update Supabase live-desktop-stream edge function
- Add robustness improvements documentation
- Add Claude Code configuration
- Add database migration for instance_id tracking

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(for file in Dashboard Workflow VirtualDesktops ClickAction TypeTextAction HttpRequestAction ManualTriggerTest MoireAnalysis MoireAnalysisNew DesktopClientSetup)

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: Cleanup unused files and update ESLint config

- Remove duplicate scripts/update-external-repos.ps1 \(JS version used\)
- Add test artifacts and linter outputs to .gitignore
- Update ESLint to ignore external directories \(backend, moire_server, etc.\)
- Add restored liveDesktop components used by MultiDesktopStreams
- Add moireDetectionService stub for moire component compatibility

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
